DOC.brief_summary: To assess implant outcomes, both clinical and radiological, in a randomized study on guided implant placement after 3-year follow-up, compared to non-guided treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Dental Implants Placed by Using a Drill Guide Versus Non-guided Placement. Follow-up Study
DOC.criteria: 1. Provision of informed consent 2. An age of at least 18 year 3. Extraction socket healing for at least 6 months 1. Unlikely to be able to comply with study procedures 2. History of intravenous bisphosphonate treatment 3. Medical history that makes implant insertion unfavorable 4. Current pregnancy 5. Present alcohol and/or drug abuse 6. Major systemic diseases 7. Untreated, uncontrolled caries and/or periodontal disease 8. History of local irradiation 9. Need for bone grafting and/or sinus lift in the planned implant area
